items.sentence: Tom is stuck in jail because he can't afford bail.
Tom's biological parents gave him up for adoption.
Tom asked me if I was happy and I said that I was.
I think that it's time for me to buy my son a car.
Eating too much black licorice can be bad for you.
I'm sure that Tom won't like the wine you brought.
Tom doesn't make enough money to support a family.
Tom played a pivotal role in the company's growth.
Please hang your coat on the hook behind the door.
Tom picked up the magazine and started reading it.
